definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: appar.= pan, dish, Pal.- Aram. [[מסרית]], only ´[[וִהִּקּת הַמּ]] 2Sa 13:9 and she took the pan;  perh. = …[[מַשְׂאֶרֶת]], orig. dough-pan ([[שׂאר]]), kneading-trough, Gei:Urschr.382f We (not Dr); > Klo Bu Ry in Di:Ex 12, 34 (3te Aufl.) ([[אֶת־]]) [[וִתִּקְרָא]] [[הַמְּשָׁרֵת]] and she called the servant (HPS del.v.)
